comment:
* App widget manager local system service interface.
 *
 * @hide Only for use within the system server.

methods.name: public abstract ArraySet<String> getHostedWidgetPackages(int uid)
methods.comment:
* Gets the packages from which the uid hosts widgets.
     *
     * @param uid The potential host UID.
     * @return Whether the UID hosts widgets from the package.

methods.name: public abstract void unlockUser(int userId)
methods.comment: * Execute the widget-related work of unlocking a user. This is intentionally * invoked just before the boot-completed broadcast is issued, after * the data-related work of unlock has completed. * * @param userId The user that is being unlocked.

methods.name: public abstract void applyResourceOverlaysToWidgets(Set<String> packageNames, int userId, boolean updateFrameworkRes)
methods.comment:
* Updates all widgets, applying changes to Runtime Resource Overlay affecting the specified
     * target packages.
     *
     * @param packageNames The names of all target packages for which an overlay was modified
     * @param userId The user for which overlay modifications occurred.
     * @param updateFrameworkRes Whether or not an overlay affected the values of framework
     *                           resources.

methodNames: public abstract void applyResourceOverlaysToWidgets(Set<String> packageNames, int userId, boolean updateFrameworkRes)
